instructions: Design and generate UI similar to Amazon and Flipkart ecommerce layouts but adapted to the project's existing theme.
Use strictly Bootstrap 5.3.8 components as the primary framework.

Do not add or assume any design elements, libraries, or features beyond what is described in these rules.
